document.docAuthor: Souza, Stephanie Pereira De, Takiya, Daniela Maeda & Felix, Márcio
document.masterDocTitle: Two new Metacephalus DeLong & Martinson, 1973 species (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Portanini) from Brazil and proposed synonymy with Paraportanus Carvalho & Cavichioli, 2009

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new Metacephalus DeLong & Martinson, 1973 species (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Portanini) from Brazil and proposed synonymy with Paraportanus Carvalho & Cavichioli, 2009

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Metacephalus
DeLong & Martinson 1973 : 225
, Figs. 1 –6. Type species:
M. albocrux DeLong & Martinson, 1973
.
Paraportanus
Carvalho & Cavichioli 2009 : 26
, Figs. 1 –14. Type species:
P. jenniferae Carvalho & Cavichioli, 2009
. ( syn. nov. )

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks . Carvalho & Cavichioli (2009) noted that species of
Paraportanus
could be divided into two groups; however, characters given for the separation of these groups are ambiguous for
M. albocrux
.
Metacephalus albocrux
shares with
M. jenniferae
(
Paraportanus
type species) the broad and bifid style apex (Fig. 7); but with members of the other group, the fused connective and aedeagus (articulated in
M. jenniferae
).

List and distribution of included valid species. For synonyms see Carvalho & Cavichioli (2009) . Distributional records from original descriptions and additional records from Carvalho & Cavichioli (2009) , Freytag & Sharkey (2002) , and Felix & Mejdalani (2016) .

Metacephalus adustus Souza, Takiya & Felix
sp. nov.
BRAZIL (Acre and Amazonas states).

Metacephalus albocrux DeLong & Martinson, 1973
. BRAZIL [ new record ] ( Acre and Amazonas states)
;
PERU ( Ucayali Department).

Metacephalus bicornis (Carvalho & Cavichioli, 2003)
comb. nov.
(
Portanus
). BRAZIL (Amazonas [ new record ], Mato Grosso, and Rondônia states).

Metacephalus bimaculatus (Carvalho & Cavichioli, 2003)
comb. nov.
(
Portanus
). BRAZIL (Rondônia State).

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Metacephalus cinctus (Carvalho & Cavichioli, 2003)
comb. nov.
(
Portanus
). BRAZIL ( Mato Grosso and Rondônia states).

(

Metacephalus marica ( Felix & Mejdalani, 2016 )
comb. nov.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Metacephalus longispinus ( Carvalho, 2012 )
comb. nov.
(
Paraportanus
). BRAZIL (Amazonas and Roraima states).

Metacephalus variatus (Carvalho & Cavichioli, 2003)
comb. nov.
(
Portanus
). BRAZIL ( Acre , Amazonas, Mato Grosso , Pará , and Rondônia states)
;
PERU ( Madre de Dios Department).

Metacephalus sakakibarai Souza, Takiya & Felix
sp. nov.
BRAZIL (Amazonas and Roraima states).
